EmailTemplate.name: India/SS61.04-21-21 BNK India/SS61 Email 6.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing the NCR SelfServ 61 – New Cash Recycler for India
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Now you can easily expand your banking services, provide access to cash to more consumers in more locations and leap ahead of your competitors—all while reducing operational costs and optimizing your cash replenishment cycle. Introducing the NCR SelfServ™ 61 Tailor-made for the Indian market, it offers: - New Scalable Recycler (SR) from NCR - Enhanced consumer experience - Biometric authentication - Extended transactions - Compact footprint See what the NCR SelfServ™ 61 can do for you. <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/61-recycler-launch]]> <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/61-recycler-launch]]> <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/61-recycler-launch]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
